name: Tree Hopper
description:
Ride your trusty grasshopper to the top of the tree. Beware the creatures of the sky!

Controls:

Left/Right: Left, Right arrow keys, or AD

Jump: Up arrow, space, or W

Contributors:

Anne Do - Developer

MuscleHakase - Artwork, SFX, Composing

Nathan Laneau - Developer
